title: jaanakI naayaka
sahitya:
jAnakI nAyaka nIku jayamangaLam nrpasUna sundaramunaku shubha mangaLam

harE



anupallavi



phAlamunaku nIdu kapOlamunaku mangaLam nIlavarna nI palu vajrAla jAmunaku

mangaLam



caraNam 1



mATalaku ratnAla krITamunaku mangaLam nATaka sUtra dhAra nE tEDa

kAntlaku mangaLam



caraNam 2



yauvanamunaku ciru navvunaku mangaLam duvvina alakala mIdi puvvulaku

mangaLam



caraNam 3



bANamunaku kusuma bANa janaka mangaLam jANatanamunaku lOka

trANamunaku mangaLam



caraNam 4



ungaramunaku nI drSTAngamunaku mangaLam pongucu padamulanundu gangakunu

mangaLam



caraNam 5



nI guNa jAlamunaku nitya shubha mangaLam nAgashayana pAlita tyAgarAja

mangaLam
